channel.title: Buying is all wrong
channel.description:
Hey guys, Well who ever coded my source is an idiot. here's what happens. Buy1 = Buy 2 Buy5 = Buy 10 Buy 10 = Buy 50
How do I fix this so that when my players want to buy for example 1 Dragon Full helm, they don't waste 18m on buying 2.
Thanks.

item.title: Buying is all wrong
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Hey guys, Well who ever coded my source is an idiot. here’s what happens.
Buy1 = Buy 2
Buy5 = Buy 10
Buy 10 = Buy 50

How do I fix this so that when my players want to buy for example 1 Dragon Full helm, they don’t waste 18m on buying 2.

Thanks.

Read full topic
